isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC), Thermostatic Expansion Valve (TXV) System, March 2007 and Later - REMOVE AND INSTALL - HVAC CONTROL PANEL ASSEMBLY

note.para: Refer to Figure 35 while performing the following steps.

caution.para: Place the ignition key in the OFF position before removing or installing the HVAC control panel assembly.

step1.para: The decorative bezel on center section of IP is secured by spring clips. Carefully pry the bezel (1, Figure 35) from center section of the IP.
Remove four screws securing HVAC control panel assembly (2) to IP.

figure.caption: Figure 35. Typical HVAC Control Panel Mounting

step1.para: Remove control panel assembly from instrument panel by pulling it straight out of its IP mounting cavity.
Disconnect wiring connector from rear of HVAC control panel.

caution.para: Place the ignition key in the OFF position before removing or installing the HVAC control panel assembly.

step1.para: Connect wiring connector to rear of HVAC control panel (2, Figure 35).
With HVAC control panel assembly correctly oriented, insert it straight into IP mounting cavity.
Verify that control panel assembly is fully seated, then secure assembly using four screws. Tighten screws to the torque indicated.
Install bezel (1) in the center section of IP by aligning spring clips and carefully pressing bezel into position.
